title: Enabling the AI Revolution in Healthcare
authors: Mona Singh, Katie Siek, David Danks, Rayid Ghani, Haley Grin, Brian LaMacchia, Daniel Lopresti, Tammy Toscos
abstract:
The transformative potential of AI in healthcare - including better
diagnostics, treatments, and expanded access - is currently limited by siloed
patient data across multiple systems. Federal initiatives are necessary to
provide critical infrastructure for health data repositories for data sharing,
along with mechanisms to enable access to this data for appropriately trained
computing researchers.
